name: The United States
startIntroPart1: President Bushington, we salute you and the proud American civilization! Freed from the British dominion in the 18th century, then cleansed and reborn after a terrible civil war, the United States nation was ready to play its great role in the 20th century. At the height of its power, triumphant after two terrible world wars, United States of America, a land of immigration, opportunities, optimism and determination, has risen above all other weakening nations, unable to equal such power.
startIntroPart2: President Bushington, will you show to the world the legitimacy of the American way of life, and spread the flame of liberty to all mankind? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Your wanton aggression leaves us no choice. Prepare for war!
attacked: You have mistaken our love of peace for weakness. You shall regret this!
defeated: The day...is yours. I hope you will be merciful in your triumph.

name: Russia
startIntroPart1: After the collapse of the Soviet Union, the new Russia fell into a deep social and economic crisis. Throughout the nineties, Yeltsin's gang tried to pull Russia out of the abyss of the crisis, but nothing came of it. After the successful suppression of the Chechen resistance under your leadership, you, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, will lead the new Russia and return its glorious name!
declaringWar: In the most difficult time of the war, in the decisive battles that determined the outcome of the struggle against the enemy, our people were alone, alone on the difficult, heroic and sacrificial path to Victory.
attacked: Russia is a country with more than a thousand years of history, and almost always it has enjoyed the privilege of pursuing an independent foreign policy. We are not going to change this tradition today.
defeated: Today we see gatherings of unbeaten punishers and their followers, attempts to rewrite history, to justify traitors and criminals, on whose hands the blood of hundreds of thousands of peaceful people.
introduction: Greetings, I, Vladimir Putin, am the President of the Russian Federation. I look forward to economic cooperation with you. But if you encroach on the lands of holy Russia, we will not disdain to knock out your teeth.
hateHello: Your sanctions only make Russia stronger.

name: Japan
startIntroPart1: Mr. Prime Minister, congratulations on your arrival. Modern Japan is no longer the wild, undeveloped Japanese Empire, but a rapidly developing scientific giant.
startIntroPart2: Prove it to the whole world. The leading brains of humanity are in your hands!
declaringWar: I hereby inform you of our intention to wipe out your civilization from this world.
attacked: Pitiful fool! Now we shall destroy you!
defeated: You were much wiser than I thought.
denounced: Alright then. I trust you've thought it through.
